bike.description: Enduro M5 alloy, fully manipulated frame w/ ORE TT and DT, forged HT, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, ISCG mount, replaceable derailleur hanger, 160mm travel

RockShox Lyrik IS 2-step, 115/160mm travel, tapered alloy steer, rebound and compression adj.
1-1/8 and 1.5" Threadless, Campy style upper with 1.5" lower cartridge bearing
3D forged alloy, adjustable rise, 31.8mm clamp
Specialized Enduro mid-rise bar, 7050 alloy, 31.8mm, 9 degree backsweep, 6 degree up, 680mm wide
Specialized waffle lock on grip (S/M) Specialized Thick lock on grip (L/XL)
Custom Avid Elixir R CR SL, alloy backed semi-met pads, alloy CR Elixir lever w/ pad contact adj & reach adj, 205mm rotor

Custom Avid Elixir CR SL Hydraulic, carbon lever blade, tool-less adj. reach and pad contact
Shimano M665-E, SLX, top swing, dual pull for double
SRAM X-0, 9-speed, mid cage
SRAM X-9 aluminum trigger
Shimano HG61, 9-speed, 11-34t

Custom Shimano integrated

Hi-Lo disc, 20mm thru-axle, 32h
Custom DT Swiss 330SL w/ alloy freehub, DT RWS QR, 32h
